title: Toko's Sparkling Idea Box
summary: This book introduces Toko, a creative child who transforms discarded items into useful and fun creations. It inspires readers to reuse and recycle to protect our planet while having fun.

texts: Hi! My name is Toko. My house is full of very special things! Wonderful things I made myself!
Ta-da! Guess what this is? It's a chair I made! I collected clean, discarded plastic bottles and connected them firmly. It's really comfortable and cool, isn't it?
My yard is like a playground I made! I transformed old tires to make a fun swing and use them as flowerpots for pretty flowers!
And this is my mom's handiwork! She weaves coconut leaves to make these strong and beautiful bags! Isn't it amazing?
Organizing my desk is no problem either! I used discarded cans to make these cool pencil holders and pencil cases!
I don't just throw away empty drink cartons either. If you wash them clean and dry them well…
You can make sturdy book stands or small boxes like this! I really like that it saves paper.
There's no need to throw away clothes you don't wear anymore! They can be reborn as pretty dolls or small bags!
There's no need to throw away clothes you don't wear anymore! They can be reborn as pretty dolls or small bags!
You can carefully collect broken glass pieces and make beautiful decorations. Don't they sparkle beautifully in the sunlight?
Our house is full of sparkling ideas! Isn't it amazing how discarded items can be reborn so wonderfully?
Do you have any great recycling ideas?
If we all look closely around us, we can turn discarded trash into wonderful treasures! A sparkling idea just came to your mind too, didn't it? Let's create something exciting together!

missions.title: Create Your Own Idea Box
missions.description: Find something you don’t use anymore and turn it into something new. Share your idea with friends!

vocabulary.definition: To use waste or old materials to make something new.
Something thrown away because it’s no longer wanted or needed.
